brainly_data.question: How has social media influenced your relationships?
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: How has social media influenced your relationships?
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: Not sure if this counts but I've made many friends on social media. so many memories and it's been super fun.

all_answers.question: How has social media influenced your relationships?
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text:
I find popular social media pretty unnecessary and I don't have any account on them. 
Next, the only account I have with my real name is the Quora's one, and maybe some on different chess sites (not my name but them are amenable to me)
I usually stay anonymous on various fora, so social network don't influence my "real" life and relationship.
